page.title: 03UNIVERSITY OF KENT
page.content: {State} Founded 1965 by Royal Charter. All Christian denominations,jews and moslems are represented among staff and students. {Annual fees} Undergraduates 500 pounds + college fee 101pounds.Overseas undergraduates(non science)3,310pounds, science subjects4,350pounds.Full time post graduates1,569pounds.Part time 390pounds,overseas 3,150pounds. {Academic staff}500+research staff {Number of students} 4000 {Ages} 18-54 mixed. {Courses} 200 Honours degree programmes 79 subject areas taught ranging from African & Caribbean Studies to Microbiology. {Sports Facilities}Large sports hall,which can be divided into areas for different sports.8 squash courts. {Leisure} 100 student societies.
